member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmAccessStatus
member.summary: Indicates whether the user has given permission for the app to set alarms.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmAccessStatus.AllowedWithoutWakeupCapability
member.summary: The user has given permission for the app to set alarms, but the alarms cannot wake up the computer from standby.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmAccessStatus.AllowedWithWakeupCapability
member.summary: The user has given permission for the app to set alarms, and alarms can wake up the computer from standby.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmAccessStatus.Denied
member.summary: The user has denied permission for the app to set alarms.

member.name: F:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmAccessStatus.Unspecified
member.summary: The user has not responded to a permission request for the app to set alarms.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmApplicationManager
member.summary: Requests permission from the user to set alarms, and retrieves the status of user permission for the app to set alarms.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmApplicationManager.GetAccessStatus
member.summary: Retrieves the status of user permission for the app to set alarms.
member.returns: Indicates whether the user has granted permission to set alarms.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.AlarmApplicationManager.RequestAccessAsync
member.summary: Requests permission from the user to set alarms.
member.returns: This method returns an AlarmAccessStatus value when it completes.
